scripts.error-test: samples test app --msg "Something broke!" --url "http://localhost:33332/error" --port 33332  -- snippets.js express
scripts.exception-test: samples test app --code 500 --msg SyntaxError --url "http://localhost:33333/exception" --port 33333  -- snippets.js express
scripts.all-test: npm run test && npm run error-test && npm run exception-test
